item.title: Lake Bled
item.description: According to a legend which stayed with the people, the temple of the ancient Slavic goddess Å½iva, once stood in the place of the present Baroque church. The temple disappeared during battles between the followers of the pagan religion and Christians, who destroyed the altar and built a church.
